amendment.description: An amendment numbered 65 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to limit the use of funds under this Act to carry out the provision that allows a lack of sufficient jobs to qualify for statewide and partial work requirement waivers for able-bodied adults without dependents.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
